subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Dustin Johnson ran away from the winners-only field in Kapalua, Hawaii, posting a 54-hole score of 16-under 203 to win by four strokes over Steve Stricker.
snippet: Dustin Johnson ran away from the winners-only field in Kapalua, Hawaii, posting a 54-hole score of 16-under 203 to win by four strokes over Steve Stricker.
